attributes.additional_details:
17.4m voted leave to 16.1 million to Remain
406 Constituencies voted Leave 242 voted Remain
148 Labour & 247 Con votes leave but only 84 Lab & 80 Con voted Remain.
By Region: 9 voted Leave & 3 Voted Remain
160 MP's voted Leave 486 voted Remain

Parliment is not reflecting in any shape or form the British public
attributes.background:
Despite clear Leave EU instructions by the people, it is clear Government and Parliament are in disarray and not representing the people.
This election will be based on selecting MP's based on their Leave/Remain credentials therefore another election will be called in 3 years after Brexit
